summary: Follow the story of a couple who goes to a small French fishing village to try to solve the problems of their deteriorating marriage.
cast: Philippe Noiret|Silvia Monfort|Marcel Jouet|Albert Lubrano|Anna Banegas|André Lubrano|Rossette Lubrano
keywords: fishing village|marriage|french new wave|f rated|marriage drama
title: La Pointe-Courte
